content: i just got into the porch goose craze so when i received my goose for christmas i wanted to make him a sweater asap i m a bit psu fan so i added the lettering from a cross stitch design website however this pattern is so easy it can be modified in many different ways please let me know if there are any errors i was winging it tee hee and i would love to improve where possible post your pictures and let me see your warm porch geese
